alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail; West Becker; West Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 5:04PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Otter Tail and south central Becker Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 503 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dunvilla, or 11 miles southwest of Detroit Lakes, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pelican Rapids, Lake Lida, Star Lake, Big McDonald Lake, Vergas, Dent and Shoreham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northwestern and west central Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: East Otter Tail; West Becker; West Otter Tail
